info.title: AfricasTalking API
info.description: HTTP service for interacting with all AfricasTalking API.

post.description: Collect money into your payment wallet.
Validate a bank checkout charge request
Collect money into your Payment Wallet by initiating transactions that deduct money from a customers Debit or Credit Card.
Uploads media or audio files to Africa'sTalking servers with the extension .mp3 or .wav
Initiate Mobile C2B payments on a mobile subscriberâ€™s device.

get.description: Fetch transactions of a particular payment product.
Fetch transactions of a particular payment product.

post.description: Move money from a Payment Product to an Africaâ€™s Talking application stash.
Transfer money from one Payment Product to another Payment Product hosted on Africaâ€™s Talking.

get.description: Incrementally fetch messages from application inbox.
Incrementally fetch your premium sms subscriptions.
